      • saveXml

        public int saveXml(java.lang.String url,
                   java.lang.String directoryName,
                   java.lang.String fileName)
        Save the url (XML) content in the location specified by DIRECTORY/directoryName with file name fileName.
        Parameters:
        url - URL where the XML is retrieved.
        fileName - name of the file to be stored on disk.
        directoryName - directory name.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
